markdownRemark.html:
Overview of the project and engineering decisions

I am now starting to put together a more stuctured series of weekly courses that will focus on various things to help you learn, to complement CodeAcademy. We are splitting it down into weeks numbered by calendar weeks and I shall let you know which one we are doing each week.
